title: shringara kumaara
sahitya:
shrngAra kumAra en jIvAdhAra udAra



anupallavi



venkOpa ghOra shUra samhAra dhIra vIra mAra



caraNam



aruNagirikku unnaruL vAkkaruLiya vAraDiyEn tanakkum aruLa taruNam idE

varuNapriya mAmayil vAhana suguNa vara kavi kunjaradAsa vara karunAkara
